Translations.Text: Mi Nhegga i Iboahim, amkan n Uxxam: "ur iyI pcarak acemma! Zizdeg axxam iW i wid idewwioen, wid ibedden, wid iiiinizen, iknan
Enced medden ar leio. A d asen $uoek $ef uvao, ne$ $ef yal amerkub uliif. A d asen si yal abrid ibaaden
Ad cehhden $ef l$it nnsen. A d smektin ism n Oebbi, deg ussan ipwassnen, $ef ubhim n lmal i sen Ifka. Eccet segs, cceccet ame$bun, aeawali
Sinna, ad ssirden, ad qenaen asirem nnsen, ad dewwoen i Uxxam aqdim
Akka. Win ippauzzun ayen Igdel Oebbi, ilha yas kteo, ar Mass is. Eellen awen lmal, siwa wid i wen mlan. Janbet laao n taancuoin, janbet awal n eeuo
am wid imalen ar tidep ar Oebbi, ur aS pcaraken. Win ipcaraken i Oebbi, amzun i$li d seg igenni, u iccelqef it ufoux, ne$ inheo it wavu, s amekkan lqayen
Akka. Win ippauzzun isekkiren n Oebbi, ihi, d aeezzeb n wulawen
I kunwi degs aba$uo ar lajel ipwassnen, sinna, ieegga nnsen ar Uxxam aqdim
